snippet.title: Clever Girls - Six One Indie Showcase Trailer
snippet.description:
Meet the dinosaurs of Clever Girls, see combat, and more in this trailer for Clever Girls, an upcoming story-driven, relationship-focused, turn-based DinosauRPG! Outwit poachers with stealth and teamwork while also navigating relationship drama. Explore a mysterious decaying island, defeat overwhelming odds and escape capture. Clever Girls will be available on PC, and a demo is coming to Steam in Fall 2024.

#IGN #Gaming
